short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Customize search parameters for multiple search engines

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Search Customizer is a powerful Chrome extension designed to enhance your search experience across major search engines like Google and Bing. This tool allows users to customize their search parameters effortlessly, providing more control over search results and improving efficiency.
Key Features:
1. Multi-Engine Support: Works seamlessly with Google and Bing.
2. Parameter Customization: Add and modify search parameters to refine your results.
3. User-Friendly Interface: Easy-to-use options page for quick settings adjustments.
4. Automatic URL Modification: Instantly applies your custom settings to search queries.
Whether you're a casual internet user or a professional researcher, Search Customizer adapts to your needs, saving time and streamlining your search process. Enjoy a tailored search experience with just a few clicks!
Note: This extension respects your privacy and does not collect any personal data. All customizations are stored locally on your device.
